text: Vassilis Ioannidis (born 24 June 1967) is a retired Greek football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Greek footballers Category:Apollon Pontou FC players Category:Olympiacos F.C. players Category:Panionios F.C. players Category:Proodeftiki F.C. players Category:Association football defenders Category:Greece international footballers
title: Vassilis Ioannidis
